ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Need non-kos mage for Chardok on Tribunal
ygData.msgSnippet: ... kos ... once ... if you don t get any responses here, try it at http://pub102.ezboard.com/bthemagicianstower.html The Magician s Tower is _the_ mage
ygData.messageBody:
> I then realized that I don't even know any high level mages who are not
kos
> in chardok (and who have the ability to summon people to them).
> If you know anyone who has such a character or are such a person, please
> please please let me know. I will give free rezzes with my click stick
once
> I get it.

if you don't get any responses here, try it at
http://pub102.ezboard.com/bthemagicianstower.html

"The Magician's Tower" is _the_ mage forum and you should find someone
there.

besides, you need mages 55+, but thanks to Bazaar all mages that level
should have CoH, now: prices for this spell are at 50p to 150p on TM
for quite some time now.

- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
